    • About John & Maria Hoffman


    Tampa Home Group studies the market intensely every day to improve their services and help you achieve your goals. Our mission is to provide you, the client, with the highest level of professional service, communication, honesty, and market knowledge. Our proven system for marketing and selling property works. Over the past five years, Tampa Home Group has successfully sold 97% of our listings at an average of over 99% of list price in one half of the time of the average listing in the Tampa market. Please ask to see a copy of our latest track record.
